code:
a = input()
b = input()
a1 = int(a[:a.index('x')])
b1 = int(a[a.index('x')+1:a.index('y')])
c1 = int(a[a.index('=')+1:])
a2 = int(b[:b.index('x')])
b2 = int(b[b.index('x')+1:b.index('y')])
c2 = int(b[b.index('=')+1:])
res_x = ((c1*b2) - (b1*c2))/((a1*b2)-(b1*a2))
res_y = ((a1*c2) - (c1*a2)) / ((a1*b2) - (b1*a2))
print(f'x={res_x:.1f}')
print(f'y={res_y:.1f}')
